Package com.knockk.api.business

Class ResidentBusinessService

java.lang.Object
com.knockk.api.business.ResidentBusinessService
@Service public class ResidentBusinessService extends Object
This class implements the business service for residents
Author:
graceradlund

  • Method Details

    • createFriendship

      public FriendshipModel createFriendship(UUID invitorId, UUID inviteeId) throws Exception
      Creates a friendship. Used for creating or updating a friendship.
      Parameters:
      invitorId - : id of the resident who sent the request
      inviteeId - : id of the resident who is receiving the friendship request
      Returns:
      a friendship model that contains details about the friendship
      Throws:
      Exception

    • deleteFriendship

      public boolean deleteFriendship(UUID residentId, UUID friendId) throws Exception
      Deletes a friendship.
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident who wants to delete the friendship.
      friendId - : id of the friend who the resident no longer wants to be friends with
      Returns:
      a boolean if the friendship has successfully been deleted.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there was a problem deleting the friendship

    • getFriendship

      public FriendshipModel getFriendship(UUID residentId, UUID friendId)
      Retrieves information about a friendship. Used to see if a friendship is pending. NOTE: friendship will not be made in the db until someone makes a request. It will be deleted if they are connected, and someone removes the connection. NOTE: will throw an exception if a friendship does not exist. NOTE: usually won't make this call if you know a friendship is already accepted
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident (user)
      friendId - : if of the friend (neighbor)
      Returns:
      a friendship model which contains details about the friendship

    • updateFriendship

      public FriendshipModel updateFriendship(UUID invitorId, UUID inviteeId, boolean isAccepted) throws Exception
      Updates a friendship. Used for creating or updating a friendship.
      Parameters:
      invitorId - : id of the resident who sent the request
      inviteeId - : id of the resident who is receiving the friendship request
      isAccepted - : if the invitee has accepted the friendship (will always be false if creating a friendship)
      Returns:
      a friendship model that contains details about the friendship
      Throws:
      Exception

    • login

      public LoginModel login(UserModel credential) throws CredentialException
      Get the credentials from the AdminModel sent in the request body and use the data service to login
      Parameters:
      credential - AdminModel that was sent in the request body
      Returns:
      response back from the data service
      Throws:
      CredentialException - exception thrown if the credentials are invalid

    • getNeighborResidents

      public ArrayList<UnitResidentModel> getNeighborResidents(UUID residentId, int floor, int room)
      Retrieves a list of residents in a neighboring unit by resident unit floor and room.
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident (user) who is checking for neighboring residents
      floor - : floor the unit is on
      room - : room the unit is in
      Returns:
      a list of unit residents

    • getNeighborUnits

      public List<NeighborRoomModel> getNeighborUnits(UUID residentId) throws Exception
      Uses the resident id to find the unit id from the lease, then find the unit.
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident who is finding their neighbor
      Returns:
      a list of NeighborRoomsModel (s) which has details about the resident's neighbors
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown if there is an exception in the data service

    • getResident

      public ResidentModel getResident(UUID residentId)
      Retrieve a resident by their id.
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident
      Returns:
      a resident model which contains the resident's information

    • updateResident

      public boolean updateResident(UUID residentId, OptionalResidentModel residentInfo) throws Exception
      Updates a resident
      Parameters:
      residentId - : id of the resident
      residentInfo - : model that has information of the resident that will be updated
      Returns:
      a boolean if the resident was successfully updated
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is a problem updating the resident
